title: Peter Butler (rugby union)
text:
Peter Butler (born in <a href="Gloucester">Gloucester</a>) is a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who played at <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%2315.%20Full-back">Fullback</a> for <a href="England%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">England</a> between 1975 and 1976.
During his career at international level he won 2 England caps and scored 2 penalties, 2 conversions (10 test points).
As a child Peter Butler attended Finlay Road Infants and Juniors School.
